Challenge

Class Save

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.Save

  • class Save
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to save the game state each tick to ensure Player progress is never lost. Games may be loaded from original files or their created save file variants produced by this class
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Samuel Roach, George Carpenter

      • writeSize

        private int[] writeSize()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the size of the level to the save file, before passing it to the remaining save functions
        Returns:
        the size of the Level grids, used elsewhere
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - because IO is messy

        private void writeTeleporter(Teleporter teleporter,
                             java.util.ArrayList<Teleporter> writtenTP)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes Teleporters to the save file
        Parameters:
        teleporter - the Teleporter to save
        writtenTP - the list of already written teleporters, used to avoid duplication (not that it matters)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - because IO is messy
